## Public Member Functions

### getType() {#afa1ddb91b119080599eeb32d57ea26d1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>ArrayType &#42; llvm::ConstantArray::getType () const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Specialize the <a href="#afa1ddb91b119080599eeb32d57ea26d1">getType()</a> method to always return an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arraytype">ArrayType</a>, which reduces the amount of casting needed in parts of the compiler.
